api_list.name: Get Item Information
api_list.description:
Get an item information by item id.
item id starts with a letter "m" which is show on URL.
for example:
https://www.mercari.com/us/item/m87613775748

m87613775748 is the item id you are looking for.

api_list.name: Get Seller Information
api_list.description:
Get a seller information by seller id.
Seller id is a bunch of number which is show on URL.
for example:
https://www.mercari.com/u/589609090

589609090 is the seller id you are looking for.

api_list.name: Get Parent Category
api_list.description: get a parent category of a sub category  by id

api_list.name: Get Sub Categories
api_list.description: get all sub categories by parent category id

api_list.name: Get All Categories
api_list.description: Getting all parents and sub categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mercari.p.rapidapi.com/Mercari/GetAllCategories"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mercari.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

Screen Protector fits both iPhone 6 and iPhone 6s Phones

* 0.26mm tempered glass screen protector, perfect cut to fit your screen, 2.5D round edge provides more comfortable feeling than the regular right angle edged screen protectors.
Tempered Glass Screen Protector fits both iPhone 6+ and iPhone 6s+

*One-push super easily installation: Precise laser cut tempered glass made with polished, rounded edges, automatically attaches to the screen smoothly, hassle-free and bubble-free. No residue when removed, can be reapplied as long as adhesive is not damaged. 

*Featuring maximum protection: 99.99% HD Clarity and Touchscreen Accuracy, Oleophobic screen coating magically resists oils and reduces annoying fingerprints, against dirt and dust. Explosion-proof 9H Hardness Scratch-resistant screen protector can effectively protect your iPhone X from unwanted scuffs and scratches by knife, keys and some other hard substances.

items.item_name: Iphone 11 pro Max battery case new
items.decription:
Advanced Sync-through TECHNOLOGY: Amazing sync-through technology that you can charge your battery case and iPhone 11  simultaneously with your existing iPhone charging cable,conveniently sync your iPhone 11 Pro Max to your MacBook, PC or laptop without having to take the battery case off.

MAX PROTECTION: The battery case is not only a portable charger, but also a protector for your iphone.Raised sides and hard-shell design maximizes protection to your iPhone 11 durable high- class material to protect your iPhone from scratches, drops, impacts and other daily wear and tear.

LONG BATTERY LIFE: 5000mAh capacity rechargeable built-in lithium polymer battery case provides extra 150%+ power which is equivalent to an additional 6+ hours talk time or 10+ hours web-browsing time. 4 LED lights indicate how much power you have (25%--50%--75%--100%). Power switch allows you to switch on/off the battery case.

items.item_name: iPhone 7 Gold & Castify Custom Leopard C
items.decription:
PHONE

-iPhone 7, one owner- unlocked
-128gb
-I have the original box I can ship it in along with the charging block and cord. NO headphones
-aesthetically in almost perfect condition, just normal possible minor ware. I have ALWAYS kept a case and screen protector on it.
-WARNING- battery has weakened. Stays on perfectly all day, but once it gets to about 30%, drops quicker than usual. May eventually need a new battery. 

CASE-

-Casetify custom made leopard case with a popsocket base attached (I can remove, but it is worth an extra $6 so I kept it on).
-Case is almost brand new- just getting rid of the phone, so the case goes too. I attached my order date in October. 

Together asking for $150

If you only want one:
Phone- $125
Case- $35

New iPhone 11 (6.1")  White Laser Marble Case with Holder. Soft TPU Silicone IMD. Gorgeous Marble Print with Holographic Rainbow Gradient Overlay. Very Pretty Case. 

Available for iPhone Models: 7/8, 7plus/8Plus, X/XS, XS Max, XR, 11, 11Pro and 11ProMax
